text: Ana Derșidan-Ene-Pascu (22 September 1944 – 6 April 2022) was a Romanian fencer and sport leader. She won a bronze medal in the women's team foil events at the 1968 and 1972 Summer Olympics. Derșidan-Ene-Pascu was born in Bucharest, Romania. Derșidan-Ene-Pascu died on 6 April 2022 at the age of 77.Fosta mare scrimeră Ana Pascu a încetat din viață la vârsta de 77 de ani ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Romania Category:Romanian fencers Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest
title: Ana Derșidan-Ene-Pascu
